text: This is a really stupid question but do you have a featured image on the article you are looking at?
<@U38EZFVFE> I'm on a listing page, which could be the issue... but the interesting thing is this template works on my other listing pages, but not on this one.
also, stupid questions are good!  I still make stupid mistakes all the time
ugh... it's because it was wrapped in a for loop.  had to go with `post.post_list_summary_featured_image` instead of `content.post_list_summary_featured_image`
